src:
設楽悠、東京マラソン出場へ…五輪札幌変更に「選手は従うだけ」

04 Nov 2019, 02:17

　男子マラソンの前日本記録保持者、設楽悠太（ホンダ）は３日、来年３月の東京マラソンに出場する意向を明かした。東日本実業団対抗駅伝に出場後、取材に応じた。残り１枠の東京五輪代表権を得るには、２時間５分５０秒の日本記録の更新が必要となる。五輪マラソンの札幌への開催地変更は「決まった以上、選手は従うだけ」と冷静に受け止めた。
text:
Shitara-san, Tokyo Marathon participation ... "Solver just follow" to change the Olympics Sapporo

04 Nov 2019, 02:17

The previous Japanese record holder of the men ’s marathon, Honda, announced on March 3 that he will participate in the Tokyo Marathon next March. After participating in the East Japan Business Team opposition Ekiden, responded to the interview. To get the remaining right to represent the Tokyo Olympics, it is necessary to update the Japan record for 2 hours 5 minutes 50 seconds. The venue change to Sapporo for the Olympic marathon was calmly accepted as "the player only follows as long as it was decided."
